titleStmt.title: A vindication of Colonell Sandys his honour and loyalty from a declaration pretended to be set forth by him at Worcester October 11, 1642 : vvhich is here also republished with it.
titleStmt.author: Sandys, Edwin, 1611 or 12-1642.

titleStmt.title: A vindication of Colonell Sandys his honour and loyalty from a declaration pretended to be set forth by him at Worcester October 11, 1642 : vvhich is here also republished with it.
titleStmt.author: Sandys, Edwin, 1611 or 12-1642.
Sandys, Edwin, 1611 or 12-1642. Declaration of Col. Edwyn Sandys in vindication of himself.

notesStmt.note: The work reprints Col. Sandys Declaration of Oct. 11 and is a vindication of Colonell Sandys' statement, "I wished that all the actions of the Parliaments forces might hereafter be unsuccessefull."
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.

person.floruit: 1611 or 1612-1642. The declaration of Col. Edwyn Sandys in vindication of himself.
